channel.title: Is this the correct format? "player.getInventory().getItem(2)"
channel.description:
I'm trying to get the item in slot1, not sure if this format is right or not.. [code]player.getInventory().getItem(2)[/code]
Would that pull the item from the second inventory slot? I found this line in my Inventory.java .. [code] public Item getItem(int slot) {[/code]
Meaning getItem(SLOT#), If i'm not mistaken, However this isn't working, I'm trying to input it into a SQL database. Earlier in the file I have this [code] Inventory inventory = player.getInventory();[/code]
To retrieve the inventory, and I have the import added aswell. [code]import com.rs.game.player.Inventory;[/code]
Any help would be appreciated! Thanks!
